thread.title: BRIEF-Rank Group H1 Adjusted Profit Before Tax 40.2 Mln Stg Vs 34.5 Mln Stg‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rank Group H1 Adjusted Profit Before Tax 40.2 Mln Stg Vs 34.5 Mln Stg‍​
text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Rank Group Plc:
* H1 ADJUSTED PROFIT BEFORE TAX AT £40.2 MILLION VERSUS £34.5 MLN‍​
* H1 GROUP LIKE-FOR-LIKE REVENUE UP 1 PERCENT AT £378.1 MILLION
* H1 DIVIDEND PER SHARE 2.15P VERSUS 2.00P‍​ * H1 NET DEBT DECREASED BY £37 MILLION * MANAGEMENT’S EXPECTATIONS FOR THE FULL YEAR UNCHANGED * H1 UK DIGITAL OPERATING PROFIT UP 56 PERCENT AT 11.4 MILLION STG
* “ALONG WITH MUCH OF THE HIGH STREET, WE HAVE FACED A MORE CHALLENGING RETAIL TRADING ENVIRONMENT IN THE FIRST HALF” - CEO
* H1 UK DIGITAL REVENUE AT 16 PERCENT AT 60.6 MILLION STG Further company coverage:
